name: Rogue Road
description:
We did not 100% complete the game on time. The game is playable, start to finish - but there are a lot of things missing relating to the core game (and theme of the jam) that we didn't get time to include. The idea was to have the other highscores AS racers in the game, so that you'd be climbing your way up through a list of other players and leaving them in the dust... but due to scope creep - we couldn't include it and thus the whole "climbing" element didn't really come to fruition! 


Unfortunate, but I think I speak for all of us when I say that we're proud of what we got done in only three days! I hope you have fun.

What's this game about?

  • Mad Max-esque racing.
  • Leaving your enemies in the dust.
  • Trying frantically not to overheat by boosting too much.
  • Trying not to explode.
  • Admiring some sweet, succulent abs.

Controls

  • W and S are to move up and down.
  • Space is to boost, but boosting too much overheats your car.
  • Hold and drag left click to shoot!

Credits

  • Stepford - Programmer & "Artist"
  • SlickRamen - Programmer & Artist
  • JoshCakeMusic - Sound Design and Composer
